articles.title: Automations and scenarios sorting
articles.desc: We added the possibility to sort the automations and scenarios in order to trigger them in the specific order you want.

articles.title: Better custom field filtering
articles.desc: Filtering on custom fields in automation filters and segments now shows possible values when possible.

articles.title: Right-to-left language support
articles.desc: The interfaces have been fully reworked to better handle right-to-left languages.

articles.title: Scheduled campaign sending time display
articles.desc: The sending time is now also shown on the campaigns listing page for scheduled campaigns.

articles.title: Timezone handling improvement
articles.desc: The timezone is better handled on the user subscriptions listing.

articles.title: Frontend campaign creation
articles.desc: The subscribers are now correctly calculated when you create a campaign from the frontend.

articles.title: Unpublished categories handling
articles.desc: The unpublished categories are now ignored when inserting articles by category in emails.

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: Maximum sites error message
articles.desc: The error message which should appear when you have already attached the maximum number of sites to your license is now correctly shown.

articles.title: Click map redirection
articles.desc: The click map in statistics now correctly redirects to the global statistics when selecting more than one campaign.

articles.title: Automation filters
articles.desc: We fixed display issues in some automation filters for dropdown fields for product selection.

articles.title: Manual bounce processing
articles.desc: We fixed an error that could occur when you manually trigger bounce processing, causing the process to stop.

articles.title: Attachments in welcome emails
articles.desc: The attachments are now correctly shown on welcome and unsubscribe emails on the edition page.
